Codes

These are some of the codes and scripts I have developed during my work and research.


  • Root_with_Python

    Collection of scripts that combine python and ROOT for data analysis. The folder TMVA contains a Machine-Learning tool based on the TMVA library.

  • XGBoost_tHq

    Collection of Python scripts to train, optimise and inject a Boosted Decision Tree using the XGBoost.

  • InDetAlignmentWebMonitor

    Package for Web App for the online monitoring of the ATLAS Inner Detector alignment.

  • DeepLearning_intro

    Completed exercises from the Udacity course Intro to Deep Learning with PyTorch.

  • MonkeyJump

    Game based on the pygame framework and inspired by the Dinosaur Game built into the Google Chrome web browser.

  • NLP_WebApp

    Watson NLP Sentiment Analysis web app with Flask.

  • NBA_Stats

    Web scraping tool to retrieve information from the ESPN webpage and perform some analysis.

  • github.io

    This website that you are seeing right now. It is based on the jekyll-uno.
